core
Class URLReader

java.lang.Object
  core.URLReader

public class URLReader
extends java.lang.Object

Reads raw HTML from an URL, and returns it as String. This class can either be instanciated or used with a static method : 1) Instanciation URLReader r = new URLReader("http://myaddress.com"); String result = r.getHTML(); 2) Static String result = URLReader.readURL("http://myaddress.com");

Author:
mw4rf
